channel.title: Mentios: RS2011 - RuneScape at 2011 | City Pking | World Hopping | Main Worlds
channel.description:
[COLOR="#0000CD"][B][CENTER] RS2011 Project thread[/CENTER][/B][/COLOR]
I decided to change this projects name just to RS2011. My webhost shutted down my website I have no idea why i'll get more info later about it. Anyways, feel free to give feedback!
[B][U]NEW NOTE: WE RELEASE SERVER TO PUBLIC FOR 24 HOURS. TO TEST THINGS OUT THIS WILL HAPPEN: 30.1.2013[/U][/B]
[COLOR="#0000CD"][B]About this project:[/B][/COLOR] RS2011 Is a huge project that has very active developers working on it. However, do you remember how it was back in the day? People were training if they wanted to kill other players they would just hop worlds and go to an PvP world, our only custom thing is that we will contain real Wilderness also. Wilderness is not active in PvP worlds tho, it's active everywhere! Anyways this thread will be updated daily for latest updates and other news.
[COLOR="#0000CD"]Here's some main info:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"][B]About shops:[/B] Will be little a bit easier. (E.G Teleportation Tablets at general stores, Bob sells up to mithril axes & pickaxes). [B]Version:[/B] 637. [B]Experience Rate:[/B] 4x of RuneScape. [B]Current Developers:[/B] Jazzy Ya Ya Ya | Fuzen Seth | Nexon Popke CheaterXMan iZlkmx
[COLOR="#008000"][B]Latest News[/B][/COLOR] Added 7 new pictures to media. Started newcomers system. (The one you need to kill a dragon with Sir Vant). Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it's perfected and fully done. Added buckets + fillables and emptying. Started Random Events, Rune Essence Mining and also Al-Kharid Desert. Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs. Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues. Added more shops. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2u7c8xj.png[/img]
-The update log will be updated daily, if not atleast every two days.- [COLOR="#008000"][B]Update log:[/B][/COLOR] 26-1-13: Started canoes. 26-1-13: Added a lot of more NPC spawns to real locations (over 80). 26-1-13: Fixed Dragon Scimitar + Korasi's Sword attack animations and maul animations. 26-1-13: Started advanced character creation system. 26-1-13: Spirit tree teleportation, corrected it and it's fully finished. 27-1-13: Finished Player Safety -exams (Questions, rewarding, handling). 27-1-13: Finished Experience lamps, antique lamps and so on. (Has media about it.) 28-1-13: Explorer jack is complete (Guy who gives some little tasks for newcomers). 28-1-13: Added Varrock museum display cases including a system for Kudos. 28-1-13: Warning system started, i'm planning to start 2011 tutorial system also. 29-1-13: Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it's perfected and fully done. 29-1-13: Added buckets + fillables and emptying. 29-1-13: Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs. 29-1-13: Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues. 29-1-13: New developer joined: iZlkmx. [COLOR="#008000"][B]-Media of Latest Updates-[/B][/COLOR] [SPOIL]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rdg58l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/eg72x2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qxp07r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/513o5u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ilhhkl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/vy1gn4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5euagg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sno5dw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1055c86.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/nvr40i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ltmu10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/e169sl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2mziqol.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m7z2gy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2v3na8o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aerxc4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/id6qrn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/euok5h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/9a7lax.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/15n4orc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/21marya.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28u342f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sav4p5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2wp7znk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ajnnfq.png[/img][/SPOIL]
The base that im using is Dementhium and[B] i would like to give credits to:[/B] [I]-Lumby -Dementhium Team.[/I]
[I]This thread is half-done and will be finished with time.[/I]

item.title: Mentios: RS2011 - RuneScape at 2011 | City Pking | World Hopping | Main Worlds
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Ruby:

It’s taking a year and a half~ to create a 2006 remake, it’ll take at least double that to include all of the features of a revision as high as this. Are you prepared to spend that time?

I’m not going to create 100% re-make, it will be close of it. Example: People hopping worlds to go PvP worlds and other activities worlds such as Minigames: Castlewars and so on.
This will be little a bit easier we’ll have 4x experiences of RS. Also we’ll have some little easier things such as: Teleportation tablets in general stores.
Better skilling shops (Example: Bob sells up to mithril axes and pickaxes).
So yeh, this won’t be full remake.

Read full topic
item.source: Mentios: RS2011 - RuneScape at 2011 | City Pking | World Hopping | Main Worlds

item.title: Mentios: RS2011 - RuneScape at 2011 | City Pking | World Hopping | Main Worlds
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

[COLOR="#0000CD"][CENTER] RS2011 Project thread[/CENTER][/COLOR]

I decided to change this projects name just to RS2011. My webhost shutted down my website I have no idea why i’ll get more info later about it. Anyways, feel free to give feedback!

NEW NOTE: WE RELEASE SERVER TO PUBLIC FOR 24 HOURS. TO TEST THINGS OUT THIS WILL HAPPEN: 30.1.2013

[COLOR="#0000CD"]About this project:[/COLOR]
RS2011 Is a huge project that has very active developers working on it. However, do you remember
how it was back in the day? People were training if they wanted to kill other players they would
just hop worlds and go to an PvP world, our only custom thing is that we will contain real Wilderness also.
Wilderness is not active in PvP worlds tho, it’s active everywhere! Anyways this thread
will be updated daily for latest updates and other news.

[COLOR="#0000CD"]Here’s some main info:[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]About shops: Will be little a bit easier. (E.G Teleportation Tablets at general stores, Bob sells up to mithril axes & pickaxes).
Version: 637.
Experience Rate: 4x of RuneScape.
Current Developers: Jazzy Ya Ya Ya | Fuzen Seth | Nexon
Popke
CheaterXMan
iZlkmx

[COLOR="#008000"]Latest News[/COLOR]
Added 7 new pictures to media.
Started newcomers system. (The one you need to kill a dragon with Sir Vant).
Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it’s perfected and fully done.
Added buckets + fillables and emptying.
Started Random Events, Rune Essence Mining and also Al-Kharid Desert.
Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs.
Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues.
Added more shops.

2u7c8xj.png764×502

-The update log will be updated daily, if not atleast every two days.-
[COLOR="#008000"]Update log:[/COLOR]
26-1-13: Started canoes.
26-1-13: Added a lot of more NPC spawns to real locations (over 80).
26-1-13: Fixed Dragon Scimitar + Korasi’s Sword attack animations and maul animations.
26-1-13: Started advanced character creation system.
26-1-13: Spirit tree teleportation, corrected it and it’s fully finished.
27-1-13: Finished Player Safety -exams (Questions, rewarding, handling).
27-1-13: Finished Experience lamps, antique lamps and so on. (Has media about it.)
28-1-13: Explorer jack is complete (Guy who gives some little tasks for newcomers).
28-1-13: Added Varrock museum display cases including a system for Kudos.
28-1-13: Warning system started, i’m planning to start 2011 tutorial system also.
29-1-13: Finished warning toggling and un-toggling system, it’s perfected and fully done.
29-1-13: Added buckets + fillables and emptying.
29-1-13: Added more World NPC and animated over 90 new npcs.
29-1-13: Added dialogues, most of lumbridge has about 80% dialogues.
29-1-13: New developer joined: iZlkmx.
[COLOR="#008000"]-Media of Latest Updates-[/COLOR]
[SPOIL]
